sourcesContent:
<template>
  <NavigationHeader/>
  <router-view></router-view>
</template>

<script>
import NavigationHeader from '@/components/NavigationHeader.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavigationHeader
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
body {
	background-color: #f5f5f5;
}
* {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
#app {
	font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	text-align: center;
	color: #2c3e50;
	margin-top: 60px;
	padding-bottom: 60px;
}

.v-enter-active,
.v-leave-active {
	transition: 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.v-enter-from,
.v-leave-to {
	transform: translateY(25px);
	opacity: 0;
}

h1 {
	margin-bottom: .5em;
}

.content {
	margin-top: 40px;
}

.card {
	border-radius: 20px;
	max-width: 500px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	padding: 4rem;
	background-color: #fff;
	box-shadow: 2.8px 2.8px 2.2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02),
				6.7px 6.7px 5.3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.028),
				12.5px 12.5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.035),
				22.3px 22.3px 17.9px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.042),
				41.8px 41.8px 33.4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05),
				100px 100px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.07);
}

.overline {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	letter-spacing: .1em;
	font-weight: bold;
}

button {
	border: none;
	font-size: 14px;
	background-color: #7DF4E1;
	padding: 1em 2em;
	border-radius: 4px;
	letter-spacing: .1em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-weight: 600;
	color: #0F2740;
	cursor: pointer;
	transition: .25s ease-in-out;
}

button.disabled {
	background-color: rgb(179, 179, 179);
}

button:not(.disabled):hover {
	box-shadow: 2.8px 2.8px 2.2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.011),
				6.7px 6.7px 5.3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.016),
				12.5px 12.5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02),
				22.3px 22.3px 17.9px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.024),
				41.8px 41.8px 33.4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.029),
				100px 100px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
}

fieldset {
	border: none;
	text-align: left;
	max-width: 500px;	
	margin: 0 auto;
}

fieldset:not(:last-of-type) {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
	padding-bottom: 40px;
	margin: 0 auto 40px;
}

legend {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-weight: bold;
	margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.field {
	font-size: 20px;
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 100%;

	&.checkbox {
		
	}
}



.field > * {
	display: block;
}

label {
	font-size: 1.2rem;
	margin-bottom: 1.4em;
	display: block;

	.label {
		font-size: .85em;
		font-weight: bold;
		color: #666;
		margin-bottom: 0.5em;
	}
	input {
		font-size: 1em;
		width: 100%;
		height: 2.5em;
		padding: 0 .75em;
		border-radius: 4px;
		border: 1px solid #acacacac;
		transition: .25s ease-in-out;
	}
	&.checkbox {
		cursor: pointer;
		display: flex;
		align-content: center;

		.label {
			display: flex;
			align-items: center;
			padding-left: .8em;
			margin-bottom: 0;
		}
		input {
			height: 1.4rem;
			width: 1.4rem;
		}
	}
	
}

.checkbox-percentage {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
	max-width: 100px;
}


// label {
// 	font-size: .85em;
// 	font-weight: bold;
// 	color: #666;
// 	margin-bottom: 0.5em;

	
// }



input:hover {
	border: 1px solid #7DF4E1;
}

input:focus {
	border: 1px solid #0F2740;
	outline: none;
}

input::-webkit-outer-spin-button,
input::-webkit-inner-spin-button {
	-webkit-appearance: none;
	margin: 0;
}

/* Firefox */
input[type=number] {
	-moz-appearance: textfield;
}

.tac {
	text-align: center;
}

.ls--wide {
	letter-spacing: .11em;
}
.fz--large {
	font-size: 30px;
}

.field-group {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
}

.field-group > label {
	width: calc(50% - 10px);
}


</style>
